entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY, COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SHOWERS LIKELY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT
